[00:00.00]Smokin Out The Window - Bruno Mars (布鲁诺·马尔斯)/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic
[00:00.47]Lyrics by：Bruno Mars/Brandon Anderson/Dernst Emile II
[00:00.94]Wait a minute this love started out so tender so sweet
[00:03.60]
[00:04.23]But now she got me
[00:05.41]Smokin out the window
[00:07.93]
[00:12.02]Must have spent 35 $45,000 up in Tiffany's
[00:16.14]Oh no
[00:17.41]Got her bad a*s kids runnin round my whole crib like it's Chuck E Cheese
[00:21.89]Whoa whoa
[00:23.34]Put me in a jam with her ex-man in the UFC
[00:27.51]
[00:28.41]Can't believe it
[00:29.73]Can't believe it
[00:31.04]I'm in disbelief
[00:32.02]
[00:32.59]This b***h got me payin her rent payin for trips
[00:36.84]Diamonds on her neck diamonds on her wrists
[00:39.39]And here I am all alone
[00:40.96]
[00:41.47]All alone
[00:42.85]I'm so cold I'm so cold you got me out here
[00:46.46]Smokin' out the window
[00:49.12]
[00:50.09]Smoking out the window
[00:51.58]Singing how could she do this to me
[00:55.41]How could she do this to me
[00:57.63]Oh I thought that girl belonged to only me
[01:02.00]
[01:03.15]But I was wrong
[01:06.17]Cuz she belong to everybody everybody
[01:14.99]
[01:16.48]Just the other night she was grippin on me tight
[01:19.01]Screamin Hercules
[01:20.19]Hercules Hercules
[01:21.48]
[01:22.18]Got me in the club looking for a new love someone help me please
[01:26.10]Help me please help me please
[01:27.50]
[01:28.05]Baby why you doin this why you doin this to me girl
[01:33.32]
[01:33.92]Not to be dramatic but I wanna die
[01:37.00]This b***h got me paying her rent paying for trips
[01:41.28]Diamonds on her neck diamonds on her wrists
[01:43.68]And here I am all alone
[01:45.83]All alone
[01:47.27]I'm so cold I'm so cold
[01:48.88]You got me out here
[01:50.79]Smokin out the window
[01:52.28]Smokin out the window of the Benzo the Benzo
[01:55.85]Singin how could she do this to me
[01:59.56]How could she do this
[02:01.70]Oh I thought that girl belonged to only me
[02:05.63]One things for sho one things for sho
[02:07.64]But I was wrong
[02:09.21]I was wrong
[02:10.60]Cause she belong to everybody everybody
[02:15.62]Yeah she belong to everybody that girl yes she belong to everybody
[02:19.93]
[02:21.12]Oh no
[02:22.35]
[02:23.33]Look here baby I hope you find whatever it is that you need
[02:26.02]
[02:27.30]But I also hope that your trifling a*s
[02:29.54]Is walking round barefoot in these streets lookout
[02:31.91]
[02:32.65]Girl it breaks my heart that you ain't right here with me
[02:37.10]Now I gotta give you back
[02:38.85]Gotta give you back
[02:40.04]To the city
[02:41.77]Oh you got me
[02:43.47]Smokin out the window
[02:45.76]
[02:48.51]Singing how could she do this to me
[02:52.50]How could she do this baby
[02:54.58]Oh I thought that girl belonged to only me
[02:58.85]
[03:00.19]But I was wrong
[03:02.04]I was wrong
[03:03.27]Cause she belong to everybody
[03:08.38]She belong to everybody
[03:09.80]
[03:11.37]She belong to everybody
data.trans:
[ti:Smokin Out The Window]
[ar:Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic]
[al:An Evening With Silk Sonic]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.94]稍等片刻 起初这份爱是那么温柔 那么甜蜜
[00:03.60]
[00:04.23]但现在她让我 
[00:05.41]满脸忧愁 在窗边抽着烟
[00:07.93]
[00:12.02]在蒂芙尼珠宝店里一掷千金
[00:16.14]//
[00:17.41]我家就像是查克起司店 她调皮的孩子在我家捣乱胡闹 
[00:21.89]//
[00:23.34]让我与她的前任陷入困境 就像在格斗赛场上较量一般
[00:27.51]
[00:28.41]不敢相信
[00:29.73]不敢相信
[00:31.04]我满腹疑虑
[00:32.02]
[00:32.59]这个女人让我为她支付房租 掏钱带她旅行 
[00:36.84]她身上的钻石珠宝 都由我买单
[00:39.39]可现在我形单影只
[00:40.96]
[00:41.47]形单影只
[00:42.85]我心灰意冷 我心灰意冷 你让我走到这般境地
[00:46.46]满脸忧愁 在窗边抽着烟
[00:49.12]
[00:50.09]满脸忧愁 在窗边抽着烟
[00:51.58]歌唱着 她怎么能对我这么残忍
[00:55.41]她怎么能对我这么残忍
[00:57.63]我天真地以为那个女孩只属于我一人
[01:02.00]
[01:03.15]但我大错特错
[01:06.17]因为她见异思迁 玩弄感情
[01:14.99]
[01:16.48]前几天的晚上 她紧紧地抓住我
[01:19.01]呐喊着 赫拉克勒斯
[01:20.19]赫拉克勒斯 赫拉克勒斯
[01:21.48]
[01:22.18]让我在夜店里寻觅新欢 谁能向我伸出援手
[01:26.10]请救救我 请救救我
[01:27.50]
[01:28.05]宝贝 你为什么要这样 你为什么要这样对我 女孩
[01:33.32]
[01:33.92]不愿无理取闹 但我想一死了之
[01:37.00]这个女人让我为她支付房租 掏钱带她旅行
[01:41.28]她身上的钻石珠宝 都由我买单
[01:43.68]可现在我形单影只
[01:45.83]形单影只
[01:47.27]我心灰意冷 我心灰意冷
[01:48.88]你让我走到这般境地
[01:50.79]满脸忧愁 在窗边抽着烟
[01:52.28]满脸忧愁 在车窗边抽着烟
[01:55.85]歌唱着 她怎么能对我这么残忍
[01:59.56]她怎么能如此绝情
[02:01.70]我天真地以为那个女孩只属于我一人
[02:05.63]有一点是毋庸置疑的 有一点是毋庸置疑的
[02:07.64]但我大错特错
[02:09.21]我大错特错
[02:10.60]因为她见异思迁 玩弄感情
[02:15.62]她见异思迁 玩弄感情 那个女孩见异思迁 玩弄感情
[02:19.93]
[02:21.12]//
[02:22.35]
[02:23.33]听着 宝贝 我希望你能如愿以偿
[02:26.02]
[02:27.30]但我也希望你光着脚
[02:29.54]迈着浪荡的步子 四处搜索目标
[02:31.91]
[02:32.65]女孩 你不在我身边 让我伤心欲绝
[02:37.10]现在我要将你还给
[02:38.85]将你还给
[02:40.04]这座城市
[02:41.77]你让我进退维谷
[02:43.47]满脸忧愁 在窗边抽着烟
[02:45.76]
[02:48.51]歌唱着 她怎么能对我这么残忍
[02:52.50]她怎么能如此绝情 宝贝
[02:54.58]我天真地以为那个女孩只属于我一人
[02:58.85]
[03:00.19]但我大错特错
